config.EvenMoreImmersiveManure.name: Even More Immersive Manure
config.EvenMoreImmersiveManure.descripti: Whether to turn manure from debris into actual physical objects that you have to collect by hand (like eggs) and that will not disappear overnight if not collected by the farmer or an auto-grabber. As a side effect, this will make collecting manure grant farming experience.
config.DropChance.name: Manure Drop Chance
config.DropChance.description: Chance an animal drops manure every day. Defaults to 0.5 (50%, or roughly once every 2 days).
